twfeweights 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    gt_weights

    gt_weights.Rd

    a class for holding and working with group-time weights

    gt_weights(
  g,
  tp,
  treated = NULL,
  comparison = NULL,
  weights_treated,
  weights_comparison,
  weighted_outcome_treated = NULL,
  weighted_outcome_comparison = NULL,
  weighted_outcome_diff = NULL,
  alpha_weight
)

    Arguments

    g

    the current group for which the weights will be computed

    tp

    the time period for which the weights will be computed

    treated

    a vector of units that make up the effective treated group for group g and period tp

    comparison

    a vector of units that make up the effective comparison group for group g and period tp

    weights_treated

    a vector of weights for the treated group g in time period tp

    weights_comparison

    a vector of weights for the comparison group for group g in time period tp

    weighted_outcome_treated

    the mean outcome for the treated group after applying weights_treated to it

    weighted_outcome_comparison

    the mean outcome for the comparison group after applying weights_comparison to it

    weighted_outcome_diff

    the difference between the mean outcomes for the treated and comparison groups after applying weights to them

    alpha_weight

    the contribution of this term to the estimate of alpha

    Contents

    Developed by Brantly Callaway.
